# <a name="how-do-i-turn-off-skype-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="62533-102">Outlook.com에서 Skype를 끄려면 어떻게 해야 합니까?</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62533-102">How do I turn off Skype in Outlook.com?</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62533-103">Outlook.com에서 Skype를 제거할 수는 없지만 알림을 사용 하지 않도록 설정할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62533-103">You can't remove Skype from Outlook.com, but you can disable notifications:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="62533-104">열기</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62533-104">Open</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="62533-105">**설정** > \*\*\*\* 일반 > **[알림](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/general/notifications)** 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62533-105">**Settings** > **General** > **[Notifications](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/general/notifications)**.</span></span> 
2. <span data-ttu-id="62533-106">**채팅 및 통화**에서 더 이상 필요 없는 알림 유형을 사용 하지 않도록 설정 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62533-106">Under **Chat and call**, disable the notification types you no longer want.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="62533-107">Skype를 사용 하는 방법에 대 한 자세한 내용은 [Outlook.com에서 skype로 가족 및 친구와 의견](https://support.office.com/article/83c6a5b1-3921-479c-b9e9-e753ce59c1fa?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy)을 검토 하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="62533-107">For more information on using Skype, read [Talk to family and friends on Skype in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/83c6a5b1-3921-479c-b9e9-e753ce59c1fa?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
